 1996-14881996-09-240,  FIN,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendments to the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS establishing new rules for the computation of the resource allowance, which is a deduction provided to taxpayers in the mining and oil and gas sectors, instead of allowing for a deduction of provincial crown royalties and mining taxes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1996-0451 Publication Date: 1996-10-16
Attachments
precis:
Amendments to the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS establishing new rules for the
computation of the resource allowance, which is a deduction provided to
taxpayers in the mining and oil and gas sectors, instead of allowing for
a deduction of provincial crown royalties and mining taxes.
